des:
The revamped MLB skill provides fans with the most up-to-date scores, stats, team standings, schedule information, and highlights. Plus, if you are an MLB Audio subscriber, you can link your MLB account to listen to every live MLB game right on your Alexa enabled device. 

To get started say, "Alexa, open MLB". 

MLB AUDIO:
If you would like to listen to live MLB Audio, just say "Alexa, ask MLB to play the Red Sox game."
**Note: If this is your first time using the skill to listen to MLB Audio, you'll need to link your MLB account.**

Only SOME Spring Training games will have MLB Audio.

You can also ask questions like:

SCORES:
 - Who is winning the Astros game?
 - Who won the Cubs game last night?
 - Who won the last Nationals vs Mets game?

STATS:
 - Who has the most home runs this year?
 - Who leads the Major Leagues in batting average?
 - Who has the most hits this year on the Washington Nationals?
 - How many hits do the Yankees have this year?
 - How many home runs did the Texas Rangers hit in 2011?
 - Which team has the best earned run average this year?
 - Who is the all-time home run leader?
 - How many times have the Yankees won the World Series?

SCHEDULE:
 - Who do the Diamondbacks play next?
 - What time is the Orioles game this Thursday?
 - Who do the Cincinnati Reds play next?

STANDINGS:
 - What place are the Yankees in?
 - Who is in 1st place in the AL West?
 - What is the Cincinnati Reds record this year?
 - What place did the Giants finish in 1897?
 - Who won the World Series in 1986?

HIGHLIGHTS - Ask Alexa for game recap highlights dating back to 2019:
 - Show me the highlights from yesterday's Dodgers game.
 - Show me what happened in the Rangers game on September 27th, 2020.
 - Show me the top plays from the Braves game on July 1, 2021.

ACCOUNT LINKING
If you have not logged in to your MLB account this year and you're having trouble linking your account to the Alexa skill. Please visit mlb.com to reset your password and try linking your account again.

To link your MLB account, say: "Alexa, ask MLB to link my account."

For instructions on how to unlink your MLB account, say: "Alexa, ask MLB to unlink my account."

If you need further assistance please contact us at MLB.TV/Support
